act: Census (Return Particulars and Removal of Penalties) Act 2019
section_text: 1 1 The Census Act 1920 is amended as follows. 2 In the Schedule (matters in respect of which particulars may be required), after paragraph 5A insert— 5B Sexual orientation. 5C Gender identity. 3 In section 8 (penalties), in subsection (1A), at the end insert  “                , sexual orientation or gender identity.              ”

act: Census (Return Particulars and Removal of Penalties) Act 2019
section_title: Amendment of the Census Act (Northern Ireland) 1969
section_text: 2 1 The Census Act (Northern Ireland) 1969 is amended as follows. 2 In the Schedule (matters in respect of which particulars may be required), after paragraph 7 insert— 7A Sexual orientation. 7B Gender identity. 3 In section 7 (penalties for offences), in subsection (3), after  “profession” insert  “                or any particulars with respect to sexual orientation or gender identity              ” .

act: Census (Return Particulars and Removal of Penalties) Act 2019
section_text: 3 1 Section 1 extends to England and Wales. 2 Section 2 extends to Northern Ireland. 3 This section extends to England and Wales and to Northern Ireland. 4 This Act comes into force on the day on which it is passed. 5 This Act may be cited as the Census (Return Particulars and Removal of Penalties) Act 2019.
